answers.answer: It's an acronym for "Trying To Conceive".  :-)
It could mean Trying To Croak, too.
haha!  Yes, I suppose so.  Or Turning To Christ.
Right.Never assume anything.  You know the saying.

Tater Tot Casserole?Here is a list of some commonly used (and some not so commonly used ones, too!) abbreviations for you for future reference. You may want to print them off and keep them handy ; )Commonly Used AbbreviationsGD- gestational diabetesPCOS- Poly-Cystic Ovarian SyndromeLMP- First day of last periodDx- diagnosisHx- historyRx- prescriptionTx- treatmentS/S- signs & symptomsM/S- morning sickness2WW- 2 week wait (from O to AF)TMI- too much informationHere is a list from www.babycenter.com, some of these I have never heard of,lol!!AF Aunt Flo

Don't laugh, I took an electronic communications course where I had to compose 3 sentences using nothing but abbreviations and keyboard made emoticons. I should have come on here asking for help,lol! Ever seen an email or text written by a teenager, it is as if they have their own universal code...Andi
were you bored that day lol

question: Someone responded to a question I had, and sai they were TTC.  I'm not sure what that means.
title: What does TTC mean?
